name: 6th International Conference on Chemical and Polymer Engineering (ICCPE’20)
content: The Conference Proceedings will be published with an ISSN and ISBN, indexed in Scopus and Google Scholar, and archived permanently in Portico. The 6th International Conference on Chemical and Polymer Engineering (ICCPE’20) aims to become the leading annual conference in fields related to chemical and polymer engineering. Topics for ICCPE’20 include, but are not limited, to the following: Advances in Chemical Engineering Air, Water, Wastewater, and Soil Management and Treatment Applied Chemistry Biochemical Engineering CFD Desalination Fluid Dynamics, Heat Transfer, and Mass Transfer Food Processing Polymer Processing Rheology Thermodynamics Transport Phenomena
